TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔːɹ s d eɪ l ɚ æ s k h ɚ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ v ɪ ɡ s ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s d ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː z ʌ v f ɹ æ n ʃ s n oʊ p eɪ s f aɪ v f ɪ ŋ k s l æ b z s ʌ v b l uː t iː s æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ ɡ f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oːɹ p t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ə k eɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð ə v ð iː s iː n z ɪ n t uː s ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b eɪ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m eɪ t h ɚ ɹ ɛ z t eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
